name: Alien Investigators
description:
Alien Investigators is a proof of concept 2 levels platformer game , where you play as one of a bunch of aliens looking for resource boxes and avoid the deadly locals .

Controls :

WASD | ZQSD | ARROWS  to move and jump
S | down arrow to activate levers
ENTER to select characters


Assets courtesy of  KENNEY 💜
Planet by DEEP -FOLD 💜

Jump sound effect by SIMON-DEVELOP 💜

Enjoy .

This is a proof of concepts game made in 30~ish hours in total , spread here and there over a period of time .
Gamepad functionalities not activated due to a broken gamepad so no way to test it lol .
